verbose_text: However, butyrate is also an epigenetic regulator (a histone deacetylase inhibitor) that promotes early anti-inflammatory immune cell development as well as adipose tissue metabolism through the SCFA receptors GPR43 and GPR41 in adipose tissue and liver.
evidence: promotes early anti-inflammatory immune cell development               as well as adipose tissue metabolism               through the SCFA receptors GPR43 and GPR41
